title: Varini
description: A Germanic people, mentioned first by Tacitus. Localized by scholars in the vicinity of modern Mecklenburg, Germany on the basis of ancient description and Ptolemy's gazetteer.

properties.description: Modern German region within which the territory of the ancient Germanic people, the Varini, is thought to have been in Roman times.
properties.title: Centerpoint of Mecklenburg-Vorpommern
